description: Monitor newly executed processes that may establish persistence by executing malicious content triggered by user inactivity. Analytic 1 - HKCU\Control Panel\Desktop registry key (source="*WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode="1") OR (source="*WinEventLog:Security" EventCode="4688") | where CommandLine LIKE "%reg%" AND CommandLine LIKE "%add%" AND CommandLine LIKE "%HKCU\Control Panel\Desktop\%"
